review.comment: Our technican was so amazing and friendly! She explained everything and went above and beyond for us. We got to bring my son so he could see the baby in mommy's tummy. I highly recommend this place. It's adorable and customer service is A+.

The ultrasound tech was amazing! She was very friendly and made my family and I feel very comfortable. My 7 year old kept asking her questions and she was patient and kind enough to answer all of them.
I definitely enjoy my session with them, the tech was so welcoming and kind. She did an amazing job and actually got nice photos of baby

review.review_reply: Thanks Tiara!

review.comment: Really bad customer service payed for next day service and I don’t even get any updates till days later
review.review_reply: Hello Jay, I wanted to clarify again that we do not offer next day service and our tech said to expect your results by Thursday. You took the Sneak Peek test yesterday at 530pm and it takes some time to get to Sneak Peek's lab in California. You called us less than 24 hours later asking for an update and your sample was still in transit. As we mentioned on the phone Fedex did not pick up your sample last night and was picked up today. Our typical turn around time is 3 business days and express is processed the same day the lab receives it (one day sooner). We don't offer next day service for this reason as it is not physically possible. We outline this on our website and explained it when you came in. It is also stated on the waiver you signed.  Our customers love the convenience and flexibility of being able to take the Sneak Peek test after normal business hours while FedEx picks up the sample the following day. We also provide the tracking number to each of our customers so they can track their sample.
Thanks Allison!

review.comment: Had a pleasant time. Waiting area was filled with wonderful baby items to see while you wait your turn. Once in the room the bed is very comfortable, ultrasound tech double checks your choices and begins the exam. We are very happy and thankful that the tech was patient with us and caught the cutest images of our baby. Will definitely return and definitely recommend.
review.review_reply: Thanks Miriam! We look forward to seeing you and your little one again soon!

review.comment: I have a mixed review about this place. I have been a handful of times during both of my pregnancies I want to start by saying that the techs are always so kind and usually really try to get good views and photos of your baby. However my last two experiences have been disappointing. A few months ago when I went the tech said they were overbooked because a lot of people booked last minute. I waited an hour and a half past my appointment time before I was seen. I decided to let it go and chalk it up to a bad day. Today I got a text before my appointment that my tech was running late and my ultrasound didn’t start until 30 minutes my appointment. I paid for a plus package and it was honestly a complete waste of money. The tech scanned for only 12 minutes which was super disappointing considering I had an upgraded package and only took pictures of one angle of the baby, and none of them are good. I’m guessing she was rushing to get to the person after me since she was running late. I’m really disappointed and won’t be back, and I’d recommend trying a different ultrasound studio.
review.review_reply: Hello Breanne we are sorry you feel that way especially after having five ultrasounds with us previously. We did apologize for our technician running late due to the heavy snowfall today which caused an accident on our technician's way in. Unfortunately after scanning you for 15 minutes our tech was not able to see gender due to the position of the baby and free rescan was advised. Before your appointment you mentioned  that you had to pick up your child from school so you didn't have much time so we sent you the video recording of your ultrasound at no charge. Please let us know if there's anything else we can do and congratulations on the new addition!!
Thanks Gina!

review.comment: Very nice decor. Staff was very friendly & comforting. I was talked to about every step which was nice. Would recommend to friends.
review.review_reply: Thanks Sasha!

review.comment: Love this place! Staff are informative and nice the place is clean and comfy makes you feel like your right at home. Lots of options for stuff animals to put your babies heart beat. Will be coming here for all my baby ultrasounds. Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: There Jaslyn! We look forward to seeing you and your little one again soon!

review.comment:
Our tech was super sweet and made the experience very exciting. Even with  the basic package, I felt like she really took her time and explained the ultra sound so we got the most out of the time we had. Plus, the entire studio was comfortable and clean with a very welcoming energy!

Seeing your little one in 4D is super worth it!
review.review_reply: Thanks Nicolette! We love taking our time with each little mom and their little one.

review.comment: Our tech really knew her stuff and made our experience so special. She took her time and made it so fun for us. The shop was clean and so cute. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking for a unique gender reveal experience!
review.review_reply: Thanks Gemma!

review.comment: Such a magical experience. Katie was so friendly and professional. Thank you for making our special moment spectacular!!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Michelle! We are thrilled you enjoyed your experience with us!

review.comment: Second time coming to tummy vision and this place doesn't disappoint. The room is comfortable, the music is catchy, our tech is friendly and encouraging! Thank you tummy vision for a positive experience. I couldn't have been happier seeing my little man again 💙
review.review_reply: Thank you Ariel! We are so happy to see you and your little one again.

review.comment: It was an amazing experience! They were very kind and patient definitely recommend this place.
review.review_reply: Thank you Kendra! We always take our time with each mom so they can enjoy seeing their little bundle of joy.

review.comment: Beautiful experience and wonderful service ❤️
review.review_reply: Thank you Katia!

review.comment: Very nice experience!
review.review_reply: Thanks Christina!

review.comment: Had an amazing experience.  Would definitely recommend this place.
review.review_reply: Thank you Alexandra for supporting our small business!
Thank you Soulless Survivor!

review.comment: This place was very nice . I felt so comfortable here .. it was a loving environment.. she took her time even though baby was being stubborn. We got results . Would def recommend
review.review_reply: Thanks Angelique! We are so happy you felt welcomed and comfortable for your once in a lifetime experience.

review.comment: This place is absolutely the best. My husband and I have been coming here since the beginning of our pregnancy and it doesn’t ever disappoints. The techs are always warm and welcoming and so nice. I will continue to keep coming back. It brings me so much joy seeing my little bundle of joy.
review.review_reply: Thank you Nancy for your continued support! We enjoy seeing your little one get bigger and bigger each time.
Thanks Irma!

review.comment: Amazing experience!
review.review_reply: Thank you China!
Thanks Breana!

review.comment: Loved the place!! Too cute inside. Once in the room gave plenty of space for guests, the atmosphere was very pleasant. Our technician was AMAZING!! Loved how she interacted with the family and just gave us great service from the start to end!
review.review_reply: Thank you Tanna! We do our best to make this a memorable experience for everyone that is there to see the baby.

review.comment: Loved my experience. And received great pictures of my twins. This is my second pregnancy coming here and I’ve had nothing less but an awesome experience both times. Highly recommended for mommies!!
review.review_reply: Thanks Rachia! We appreciate you coming back to us and are thrilled you had a great time seeing the new additions. Congratulations!
Thanks Dearia!

review.comment: I went today for the basic 3D/4D ultrasound at 35 weeks and had Katie who was amazing. She was very welcoming and the whole experience was actually quite soothing and relaxing. I wish I would've found them sooner in my pregnancy but definitely glad I found them! I drank a lot of water through the day and she was able to get plenty of pictures of our little guy! Book with them you will not be disappointed.
review.review_reply: Thank you Taylor for supporting our small business. We are so happy you enjoyed this amazing experience!

review.comment: Loved our Tummy Vision appointment!
review.review_reply: Thank you Lexee!
Thanks Angie!
Thank you Gabriela!

review.comment: Such a cute store and not hard to find parking. Everything was clean and cozy. Tiffany was extremely kind, patient and friendly. She took the time to explain the scans as well as trying for multiple angles so we would have the best pictures of the baby.
review.review_reply: Thanks Kathleen! We love taking our time with each mom and making sure they feel as comfortable as possible.

review.comment: I would 100% Same day appointment. So much better than a schedule doctors appointment longer ultrasound times and chance to see the baby.  Nice quiet environment and a basic package is super cheap.
review.review_reply: Thank you Love Nellie03!

review.comment: Visited tummy vision January 8th for our appointment, the place was nice and clean. The tech was super friendly and professional at the same time. She did a great job answering questions and making sure the mom to be was comfortable and reassured. Thank you to everyone that makes this place possible it was much needed peace of mind !
review.review_reply: Thank you Jesse! We are so happy you and mom were able to enjoy this amazing experience.

review.comment: Great service , fast results , and reasonable price, my wife was so happy, we will definitely go back to Tommy Vision.
review.review_reply: Thanks Mahmoud! We look forward to seeing you and your wife again soon!

review.comment: We had a beautiful, magical experience! Our tech was super sweet, knowledgeable and made us very comfortable. Everything was decorated so cute and the place as a whole was very clean.
review.review_reply: Thank you Kerrie!

review.comment: I had an amazing experience! The lady Kathy was extremely nice and welcoming.
review.review_reply: Thanks Tyler!

review.comment: This place is awesome! I came in a couple weeks ago for the Doppler package and was pleasantly surprised with what I received! I was only 13 weeks at the time and did not expect to be able to see much. I pretty much just wanted reassurance. I’m having TWINS! and it was so much fun watching them on screen. What a wonderful experience it was. The bed couldn’t have been any more comfy, the screen was perfect, the atmosphere was great, and the tech I had was amazing and I feel that she went all out! I will definitely be returning sooner, rather than later, but then again later too! Oh, and a DEFINITE PLUS, the Doppler I received has given me such peace of mind! 💙💙💙
review.review_reply: Thanks Niema! Congratulations on the TWO new additions!

review.comment: Super cute place to get your 3D ultrasound done and the tech was extremely dedicated to getting a good shot. I like that she kept trying and made me and my fiancé feel like our time was valuable. Love it!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Gloria!

review.comment: Very pleasant and respectful visit and service. The technician took her time to get the best position to see the face of the baby. It was fun. My daughter didn’t want to know the gender and the tech was respectful of that. She was very happy seeing her baby moving about.  It made a special moment for us for ever.
review.review_reply: Thanks Valerie! We always recommend sharing this unique experience with your family and we are happy to hear you and your daughter enjoyed it.

review.comment: This place is worth the drive so if your a little far and hesitant DONT be Kathy is the best I went in for my 13 week ultrasound and unfortunately my baby wasn’t cooperating and Kathy was very understanding and patient with us I can’t wait to go back for my pictures when Im farther into my pregnancy i will definitely recommend this place if I could give it ten stars I would
review.review_reply: Thanks Priscilla! We look forward to seeing you and your little one again soon!

review.comment: We had 3 attempts with my little stubborn guy and 3rd time was a charm!! The technician was always friendly and patient with my baby boy and I. We appreciate the work you do and amazing bedside manner!
review.review_reply: Thanks Alexis! We love playing hide and seek with the little ones!

review.comment:
Horrible costumer service. Lady on front desk was rude. We were trying to include my step kids in the ultrasound since we were in town for Christmas. They were very involved with their little brother and we were excited for them to be part of this one too.
Her response was: yeah parents think that kids care for an ultrasound but they don't, just do a  Facebook live.
Ok, thanks for being so accommodating and understanding of this special moment.
12/13/21
review.review_reply: Hello Fiorela we are sorry you feel this way but we take Covid very seriously and have enforced strict guest counts for the safety of our customers and staff. The maxmium number of guests we allow is three with a premium package and you mentioned that you wanted to bring seven or eight additional people.  As a solution we offered live streaming for any family members that could not attend in person. We just wanted to offer some comfort by mentioning (from our experience) many kids do not always enjoy the ultrasound as much as parent's would like, but we always encourage sharing this experience with family and friends when possible. We take safett very seriously as someone on our team lost a close family to Covid and we appreciate your understanding as we continue to provide the best experience possible while keeping everyone safe. Thanks and congratulations on the new addition!

review.comment: The tech was very nice I got a very good deal I would definitely recommend this place
review.review_reply: Thanks Noah!

review.comment: I went in for a 20 week 3D/4d ultra sound and it was amazing! The experience for myself, husband and daughter was great! Seeing our son for the first time made my daughter cry. Very comfortable and wonderful experience.
review.review_reply: Thank you Marilyn!

Hello Cynthia thank you for the feedback and please allow us to clarify. We do offer a gender guarantee where if we cannot confirm gender we bring you back for another complimentary session. You originally came in on the evening of March 15 and our technician said it looks like a boy but she was not able to confirm gender so she invited you back for a complimentary session. It appears this information was minunderstood and we apologize for that. You asked us to follow up with you to set up another appointment, which we did, and you came back on Tuesday March 19. At that time we did confirm it was girl. You were happy to have confirmation and sometimes we like to go the extra mile so we gave you a gender cannon. We do hope you have a happy and healthy pregnancy journey.

review.comment: Really great experience. The tech explained everything and took her time to get great pictures. She was also so sweet with our boys who came along to see their little sibling. Really enjoyed our time, thank you!
review.review_reply: Thanks Jenna! We love taking our time with every baby!
